Using the chakra control granted by the [[Gentle Fist]], [[Hinata]] concentrates her chakra until water vortexes are created around her. Those vortexes shoot water blasts which turn to needle-like water. By using [[Byakugan]], this technique can be used with great precision to hit very small targets such as [[bees]].

== Trivia ==
* Though unnamed in the anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto: Path of the Ninja 2]]''.
